definitions.definition: The act of falsifying, or making false ; a counterfeiting; the giving to a thing an appearance of something which it is not.
A knowingly false statement or wilful misrepresentation.
The act of showing an item of charge in an account to be wrong .

main_definition: The act of falsifying, or making false ; a counterfeiting; the giving to a thing an appearance of something which it is not.
secondary_definitions: A knowingly false statement or wilful misrepresentation.
The act of showing an item of charge in an account to be wrong .
